entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms late this afternoon. High 21. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
